sentences: Mees lastis oma hääle sellele kandidaadile.
Tulemus selgus pärast seda, kuidas häälte lugemisel lasti õigetele pooltele.
context: The word 'lasti' is the past tense third-person singular form of the verb 'lastama', which means to cast or ballot. It specifically refers to the historical practice of voting by dropping balls (kuulikeseid) into a closed box. This was an early method of secret voting where voters would physically cast their votes by placing balls into containers.
